name: Turright
description:
Turright

You are the sole survivor of an epic space battle. Your turret is malfunctioning. It can only turn right and its trigger is jammed wide open. Debris is everywhere.

Rescue arrives in 60 seconds. Can you survive?

Controls
  • Tap [space bar]: Turn 10 degrees right.
  • Hold & Release [space bar]: Turn up to 350 degrees right.
